headline: Share anything you'd normally copy
subtext: Text and code snippets — all protected, all temporary. Share once or with your entire team.
trustReinforcement: Everything is end-to-end encrypted. Set it to vanish after one view or after an hour—your call.

stackItems.label: Text & Notes
stackItems.preview: Hey team, just finished the Q1 project roadmap. Here's what we're prioritizing: User authentication system with OAuth2, complete dashboard redesign focusing on mobile-first approach, API rate limiting implementation, and comprehensive documentation updates. Let's schedule a sync meeting to discuss the timeline and resource allocation. Also, we need to finalize the tech stack for the new microservices architecture.

stackItems.label: Code Snippets
